snippet.title: Mega Man X7 - Central Highway
snippet.description:
Boss: Mega Scorpio

So we start things off with our brand new character, Axl. He can jump and shoot, like X, only he can also hover and transform into enemies using his signature A-Trans, which is very situational. As you will also notice, this game has segments in 3D! Only game to do that in this series.

After some basic stuff, we switch over to Zero, revisiting what's left of Central Highway from X1. Then, after the nostalgia trip, we run into Axl, who's running away from the usual large but easy intro boss. But we catch up to him, learn how to switch characters, and then take him into custody or some answers.

Also, X hasrecently become a Mega-Pacifist and stepped away from the frontlines. Meaning he's not playable. Not right away, anyway, which is very disappointing. __

If you want to send a tip: www.paypal.me/MegaQuint
You can also follow me on Twitter: https://twitter.com/megaquint I don't post much, but here I am.
